info.description: The backend API of the TableFlow application.
info.title: TableFlow API

get.description: Get the current user's organization and workspaces that are a part of the organization
Get the current API key of a workspace

post.description: Regenerate the current API key of a workspace and return the new API key
Creates a new file upload after validating the length and parsing the metadata

head.description: Returns the length and offset for the HEAD request

patch.description: Adds a chunk to an upload, only allowed if enough space in the upload is left

post.description: Edit the value in a cell for an import. If the cell contains an error, it will run it through the validation before allowing the edit.
post.summary: Edit a cell in an import

get.description: Get a single import by the upload ID, including the row data for the first page of the review screen if the import is complete
get.summary: Get import by upload ID for the review screen

get.description: Paginate import rows by the upload ID of an import
get.summary: Get import rows by upload ID for the review screen

post.description: Submit the reviewed import by the upload ID once the data is reviewed and any errors are fixed
post.summary: Submit an import by upload ID

post.description: Get a single importer and its template

get.description: Get a single upload by the tus ID provided to the client from the upload

post.description: Set the template column IDs for each upload column and trigger the import
post.summary: Set upload column mapping and import data

post.description: Set the header row index on the upload

get.description: Download the import as a file
Paginate the rows of an import

delete.description: Delete an importer along with all associated objects (template, columns)

valid.description: Valid is false if Data is NULL

template.description: Set if the user passes in a template to the SDK (which overrides the template on the importer) or if a schemaless import occurs

message.example: This column must contain a value

rows.description: Used for the final step in the onComplete

template.description: Set if the user passes in a template to the SDK, which overrides the template on the importer

message.example: This column must contain a value
This column must contain a value
